This is an IntentService demo.\nChoose a communication option and the current integer will be sent to the corresponding service using that method. Right after that, the service will increment that value and send it back to this activity. Finally, the result will be updated on screen.

This demonstrates the bound service using the extended Binder class.\nWhen the button is tapped, the current integer will be sent to the service via binding method.\nRight after that, the service will increment that value and send it back to this activity using Local Broadcast Manager. Finally, the result will be updated on screen.
